description: The WWMT Newschannel 3 app is a must-have mobile app for everyone who lives in or cares about West Michigan. Now you can stay connected to Newschannel 3 for Live, Local, Breaking News wherever you go. You will have full access to Severe Weather Center 3 for current conditions, full forecasts and see the most powerful live Doppler radar in West Michigan. Get the latest sports scores and highlights from our sports team. You will also have complete access to area school and business closings. See exclusive special reports and I-team investigations that no other station can deliver. This app has a simple design that is easy to customize for getting the content you care about quick.   If you like the WWMT Newschannel 3 app please spread the word to your friends on Facebook and Twitter.
